name: opeLoRA
description:
These are random LoRAs I trained on based on a collection of artists, mainly sciamano

These will alter the art-style (I'm focusing on the face)

Recommended Weight: varies

try .5 for 6.0

INPAINT = GOOD

Keywords: none

PUT "red curtains" in negative if they are bothering you (I will try to fix this)

WIP

modelVersions.name: v6.0
modelVersions.description: Tried to reduce the shiny-ness off clothing.
